11.eng-name: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn Umar that:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "The one who learns the Quran is like the owner of a hobbled camel. If he pays attention to it, he will keep it, but if he releases it, it will go away

chapter.ara-name: باب جَامِعِ مَا جَاءَ فِي الْقُرْآنِ
chapter.eng-name: Collection of what was narrated concerning the Quran
